name: Rock Paper Swap
description:
Rock, Paper, Scissors - in real-time!

A 2-4 player PVP game where you must predict your enemies' actions, and transform into Rock, Paper, or Scissors to counter them. The first player to 5 points wins.

How to Play:

You'll need 2-4 Xbox Controllers, and a Windows PC.

Press X for Scissors, Y for Paper, and B for Rock.

Made in 48 hours for the Chillennium  Game Jam 2018 by Justin San Juan, YinTing He, William Lu, and Sanaa Memon.
